name: Galleon Gambit
description:
Galleon Gambit is a single-player turn-based strategy game which has players control a pirate ship to defeat the enemy! 

Each turn the player can move their different ships to attack the enemy fleet. Each ship has unique stats, skills and visuals making them different from the others. 

But winning isn't easy. The AI controlled enemy fleet is crafty and it wants nothing more than to take you down. 

Do you have what it takes to control the seas? 

Galleon Gambit has 6 unique levels which unlock in order of difficulty. Challenge yourself to finish each one in as few turns as possible!
